title: aoluain
author: aoluain
created_time: August 04, 2022, 10:48:03 AMLast edit: August 06, 2022, 07:25:25 PM by aoluain
content: Hello All, Welcome to my first FREE RAFFLEI am happy to be able to give something back FREE to the collector community here on the forum. These are based on my current BITCOIN COLOURING BOOK project and will be the first of a few FREE RAFFLE's I hope to run Â Up for auction are two original COLOURED pieces which were used in the book. Each is 1 of 1.__________Lot 1: is celebrating Bitcoin Pizza Day this year which just happened to fall when I was creating the design for the Book. I scanned and printed the artwork and then coloured it in as it was meant to be done. This was posted by me originally on the Pizza Day Celebration Thread this year.__________Lot 2: is the original coloured piece used for the cover of the book, again a digital black outline printed out and then hand coloured by myself.__________The materials used were a combination of Faber Castell Aquarelle and Faber Castell Albrecht Durer pencils.__________Each piece will be designed and dated by me on the date of the Auction endConditions:FREE postage anywhere25 tickets, 1 ticket per member - But you could be lucky enough to win both lots!No newbie members registered after 01/06/2022 can applyAfter all tickets are full I will pick 2 blocks which will determine the winner.The last two numerals will be counted - ie. 0 and 1Please dont contact me unless you winRemember keep your details private.Determining the winner - finer details.....Starting with Lot 1, I pick a blockThe last two digits of the hash will call the winnerIf the block hash digits are higher than 25 we go to the next block, and so on until there is a winner.Lot 2 continues straight after the previous winning block, same rules apply, last two digits!
